title: Cedar Creek & Belle Grove National Historical Park: Star Party
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Star Party              Star Party          If the weather looks questionable, please call ahead to verify the event is still on - 540-869-3051.   The star parties will be held at the Shenandoah Valley Battlefields Foundation Thoburn Redoubt tract.   Directions to the site: 1. Just south of Middletown, from U.S. Route 11, turn left onto Water Plant Road. Proceed 1 mile to the intersection with Long Meadow Road. 2. Turn right onto Long Meadow Road. Proceed 0.1 mile. 3. Turn right onto Bowman's Mill Road. Proceed 1.4 miles to Thoburn Redoubt. 4. The Thoburn Tract is marked by a Civil War Trails sign and some Waysides. Turn right into the property.
